pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==========redgettext==========A slightly modified version of pygettext for `Cog-Creators/Red-DiscordBot<https://github.com/Cog-Creators/Red-DiscordBot/>`_.Installation============:: pip install redgettextUsage=====Extract strings surrounded with ``_()``:: redgettext <inputfile> ...Extract strings as well as command and cog docstrings:: redgettext -D <inputfile> ...For more options, do:: redgettext -hCopyright=========Copyright (c) 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011,2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 Python Software Foundation. All rights reserved.
